Episodes.Title: Sandcastle
Episodes.Plot: Tig builds a sandcastle at the beach and wants to take it home with her. Woolly explains that the sand belongs to the beach and the sea.

Episodes.Title: The Birthday Present
Episodes.Plot: Tig unwraps a bike for her birthday. Woolly persuades Tig that she might have more fun if her mum shows her how to ride a bike.

Episodes.Title: Pandas
Episodes.Plot: Tig goes to the zoo to see a panda but is more interested in buying a toy panda.

Episodes.Title: Piano
Episodes.Plot: Tig is learning to play the piano with Mr Tonka but she won't listen to everything he says.

Episodes.Title: Echoes
Episodes.Plot: Tig and her friend Timmy visit a castle and gets scared by strange sounds in the castle. Woolly explains that they are echoes.

Episodes.Title: Getting Better
Episodes.Plot: When Tig has chicken pox she finds getting better difficult. Woolly helps to make Tig's recovery easier.

Episodes.Title: Fussy
Episodes.Plot: Tig has a fussy day. When it comes to tobogganing indoors she has to make compromises and not to be quite so fussy in order to have fun.

Episodes.Title: I Don't Smile
Episodes.Plot: A photographer comes to Tig's nursery to take photos. Tig won't smile for the photographer because she is grumpy.

Episodes.Title: Waiting
Episodes.Plot: When Tig makes a cake she doesn't like waiting for it to bake. Woolly helps her with the waiting game.

Episodes.Title: Flying
Episodes.Plot: When Tig goes on her first aeroplane trip it is her Mum who suddenly gets worried. Woolly shows Tig how to help make the trip fun for Mum.

Episodes.Title: Excited
Episodes.Plot: When Tig goes to a town festival she is very excited. When she meets her friend Angel at the festival she becomes even more excited and Angel is not happy. Woolly calms Tig down and she and Angel enjoy themselves on an exciting day.

Episodes.Title: Funny Tummy
Episodes.Plot: When a boy pushes Tig by accident at nursery school Tig doesn't want to go back and gets a pain in her tummy.

Episodes.Title: The Hat
Episodes.Plot: When Tig goes on an adventure with her grandad she loses her favourite sailor hat.

Episodes.Title: Mountain
Episodes.Plot: Tig climbs a mountain with her dad, but wants to go home before reaching the top.

Episodes.Title: Quiet
Episodes.Plot: Tig visits a forest but she doesn't like the quiet. Woolly makes her aware that quiet is more interesting that she might have thought.

Episodes.Title: Chuff
Episodes.Plot: Tig's dad takes her on a day out on a steam train. Tig enjoys the day so much that she doesn't want it to end. Woolly explains that the best days can still be enjoyed when they are over.

Episodes.Title: My Favourite Dinosaur
Episodes.Plot: Tig loves dinosaurs until she sees a real diplodocus at a museum and is scared. Woolly explains to Tig that the diplodocus is just old bones and there is nothing to be worried about.

Episodes.Title: Dobbin
Episodes.Plot: Tig is scared of horses until she meets an old horse called Dobbin. Then Dobbin dies. Woolly helps Tig overcome her loss and remember Dobbin for all the happy and good things he brought to her.

Episodes.Title: Fireworks
Episodes.Plot: Tig doesn't like fireworks. Woolly tells her there is nothing wrong with not liking something.

Episodes.Title: Holding Hands
Episodes.Plot: Tig is very grown up when crossing the road at nursery school and holds hands. When she crosses the road with her dad she refuses to hold his hand. Woolly teached Tig the importance of holding hands and crossing roads safely.

Episodes.Title: The Wedding
Episodes.Plot: When Tig's Aunt Shonagh gets married, Tig is a flower girl. Tig does an impromptu dance and brings the wedding to a halt.

Episodes.Title: Thunder
Episodes.Plot: Tig doesn't like thunder. Woolly helps Tig to overcome her fear.

Episodes.Title: Subway
Episodes.Plot: Woolly shows Tig how playing subway trains on a real subway is not a good idea.

Episodes.Title: Rain
Episodes.Plot: Dad has his car cleaned and then the rain makes it dirty again. Woolly shows Tig how to cheer her dad up and have fun in the rain.

Episodes.Title: Shadows
Episodes.Plot: When Tig gets a new night light she is frightened by shadows. Woolly shows Tig how to have fun with shadows.
